issue.title: Empty Module Placeholder
issue.description: The __init__.py file is completely empty, serving only as a module placeholder. This appears to be a migration feature module awaiting implementation.
issue.recommendation: Either implement the migration feature exports according to project patterns or add a comment indicating this is intentionally a placeholder module awaiting future implementation

issue.title: Missing Module Exports
issue.description: Project pattern #25 and #55 specify that feature modules should use __all__ exports for controlled public API. This module has no exports defined, violating project conventions for integration and feature modules.
issue.recommendation: Add __all__ declaration with appropriate exports once the migration feature is implemented, following patterns from other feature modules

issue.title: No Module Documentation
issue.description: Empty placeholder module lacks any documentation or comment indicating its purpose or implementation status
issue.recommendation: Add a module docstring or comment explaining this is a placeholder for the migration feature module, or implement the actual migration functionality

issue.title: Potentially Forgotten Implementation
issue.description: The module structure exists with subdirectories (models, orchestration, repositories, routers, services) but all __init__.py files are empty, suggesting this might be a forgotten or incomplete implementation
issue.recommendation: Either complete the migration feature implementation or document that this is intentionally a placeholder for future development

review.summary: This is an empty __init__.py file for the migrations feature module in NeoAdminApi. The file serves as a Python package marker but contains no actual implementation. The module structure includes subdirectories for models, orchestration, repositories, routers, and services, all of which also contain empty __init__.py files. This appears to be a placeholder structure for a migration management feature that has not yet been implemented.

positive_observations.observation: The module structure follows the project's standard feature organization pattern with appropriate subdirectories
No security vulnerabilities present as there is no code to evaluate
No performance issues as the file is empty

context.tests: No tests found for this module
context.documentation: No documentation present for this placeholder module
context.configuration: Module structure exists but no configuration implemented
